Feats: Keen Mind; Mobile; Mounted Combatant; Observant; Resilient Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Monk Features: Bonus Proficiencies (Way Of The Drunken Master); Deflect Missiles; Diamond Soul; Drunkard's Luck; Drunken Technique; Empty Body; Evasion; Extra Attack; Flurry Of Blows; Intoxicated Frenzy; Ki-Empowered Strikes; Ki; Martial Arts; Monastic Tradition; One With The Blade; Path Of The Kensei; Patient Defense; Perfect Self; Purity Of Body; Radiant Sun Bolt; Save Proficiency (Strength; Dexterity); Searing Arc Strike; Searing Sunburst; Sharpen The Blade; Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, Stealth); Slow Fall; Step Of The Wind; Stillness Of Mind; Stunning Strike; Sun Shield; Timeless Body (Monk); Tipsy Sway; Tongue Of The Sun And Moon; Tool Proficiency (Choose 1 from any Artisan, any Musical); Unarmored Defense (Monk); Unarmored Movement; Unerring Accuracy; Way Of The Drunken Master; Way Of The Kensei; Way Of The Sun Soul; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Shortsword) Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Monastic Tradition: 1 selection
One With The Blade: Has Magic Kensei Weapons and Deft Strike features
Path Of The Kensei: Has Kensei Weapons, Agile Parry, Kensei's Shot, and Way Of The Brush features
Tipsy Sway: Has Leap To Your Feet and Redirect Attack features
Drunkard's Luck: May spend 2 Ki Points to cancel Disadv on an ability, attack, or save roll
Keen Mind: Always knows the direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset/Can recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Ki: Can use 20 Ki Points per short rest
Observant: Can read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of NH-Rillifane Rallathil and fellow believers
Timeless Body (Monk): Suffers no debility from aging and needs no food or water
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: Can communicate in any language

Skill Notes:

Way Of The Brush: Tool Proficiency (Choose 1 from Calligrapher's Supplies, Painter's Supplies)
Observant: +5 passive Investigation and passive Perception
Combat
Hit Points: 121 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Shortsword; Simple Weapons
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+8 1d4+2); Greatclub (+6 1d8); Unarmed (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Kensei Weapons: Proficiency in choice of 5 non-heavy melee or ranged weapons
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gains +2 attack and damage with monk weapons and raises damage die to 1d10
Unarmored Defense (Monk): +2 Armor Class in no armor
Agile Parry: +2 AC for 1 rd after an unarmed attack if armed w/a Kensei melee weapon
Deflect Missiles: Can use a reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+22 HP; reducing it to 0 hit points allows spending 1 Ki Point to make an immediate attack
Deft Strike: May spend 1 Ki Point to inflict +1d10 damage with a Kensei weapon 1/rd
Drunken Technique: Gains +10' Speed and movement provokes no OA during Flurry Of Blows
Flurry Of Blows: Can spend 1 Ki Point to make 2 unarmed strikes as a bonus action
Intoxicated Frenzy: May make 3 additional Flurry Of Blows attacks on 3 different foes
Kensei's Shot: May use a bonus action to inflict +1d4 HP damage with a ranged Kensei weapon
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Magic Kensei Weapons: Attacks with Kensei weapons count as magical
Martial Arts: When unarmored, can use a bonus action to make an unarmed strike after a monk weapon attack
Mobile: Can Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Attacking a target does not provoke an opportunity attack
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Patient Defense: Can spend 1 Ki Point to Dodge as a bonus action
Perfect Self: Has a minimum of 4 Ki Points available after initiative
Radiant Sun Bolt: R30' +8 ranged touch attack inflicts 1d10+2 HP radiant once per rd; can spend 1 ki point and use a bonus action for a second attack
Redirect Attack: May use Reaction and spend 1 Ki Point to redirect a foe miss to an adjacent creature
Sharpen The Blade: May spend 1-3 Ki Points and use a bonus action to gain an equal bonus on attack and damage w/a Kensei weapon for 1 min
Step Of The Wind: Can spend 1 Ki Point to double jump distance and to Disengage or Dash as a bonus action
Stunning Strike: Can spend 1 Ki Point after a successful attack to stun the target (save DC 16 Constitution negates) for 1 rd
Sun Shield: Can use a reaction while emitting light to inflict 7 HP radiant on a successful melee attacker
Unerring Accuracy: May reroll a monk weapon miss 1/rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 6; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 6; Wisdom: 8
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient on all saves
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Diamond Soul: Can spend 1 Ki Point to reroll a save
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Purity Of Body: Has immunity to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: Can use an action to end charm or fright affecting self
Magic
Attack: Monk: 8 Spell DC: Monk: 16
Spells:
Astral Projection (Monk9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Burning Hands (Monk1 [Searing Arc Strike] Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Magic Notes:
Empty Body: Can spend 4 Ki Points to become invisible and gain resistance to all damage other than force for 1 min/Can spend 8 Ki Points to cast Astral Projection on self
Searing Arc Strike: Can spend 2 ki points to cast Burning Hands after an attack as a bonus action; each additional ki point spent raises the spell level by 1, to a maximum of level 9
Searing Sunburst: R150' 20' radius inflicts 2d6 HP radiant (save DC 16 Constitution negates); can spend 1, 2, or 3 ki points to inflict +2d6, +4d6, or 6d6 HP
Sun Shield: Can emit bright light in a 30' radius at will
